text:
Parsable, Vancouver, BC, San Francisco, CA, Full Time Onsite

Parsable is a mobile collaboration and workflow platform (Product Video: http://goo.gl/68hyJb)

We're hiring the first customer support to build out the program and hire a team next year. Customer Support Manager: https://goo.gl/MdTK9I

We're also looking for a senior fe swe in Vancouver to join the 3 person team. More info below! Frontend Engineer (React): https://goo.gl/RiyVUq
